title: Max Holloway breaks down his win over Calvin Kattar | UFC Fight Night Post Show | ESPN MMA
author: ESPN MMA
description:
Watch the entire UFC Fight Night Post Show on ESPN+
https://www.espn.com/espnplus/player/_/id/bfbe8a47-6f62-4a66-b30b-65498a6db465

Max Holloway recaps his win over Calvin Kattar on ABC and gives his thoughts on the UFC featherweight division with Alexander Volkanovski set to defend the belt vs. Brian Ortega on Mar. 27. “Blessed” closes things out (4:27) by calling out his buddy Daniel Cormier.

#UFC #MMA #ESPNMMA

localize.description:
在ESPN+上观看整个UFC格斗之夜的赛后秀。
https://www.espn.com/espnplus/player/_/id/bfbe8a47-6f62-4a66-b30b-65498a6db465

Max Holloway在ABC上回顾了他对Calvin Kattar的胜利，并给出了他对UFC羽量级部门的看法，Alexander Volkanovski将于3月27日对Brian Ortega的腰带进行辩护。"祝福 "通过呼唤他的好友丹尼尔-科米尔来结束事情（4:27）。
